documentation: SAP internal information: This file is an extract from SAP's internal system K9R, table TU_UNTT, language English. Extract the data
with the option 'Text with tables', import it into Excel, use the formular to generate a proper JSON format, copy & paste it into MS Word
and paste it into this file. Remove the last ',' and make sure to have a closing '] }'
formular in Excel (quotation marks can't be displayed here correctly, so replace ' by " in the formular):
